text: Telvum Thangzalam Haokip (T.T. Haokip) is an Indian politician and a formermember of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Haokip was elected as a member of the Manipur Legislative Assembly from Henglep constituency in Churachandpur District as a Bharatiya Janata Party candidate in 2017.http://www.hindustantimes.com/interactives/election- candidates-2017/manipur/henglep/ Currently he war the Chairman of the Hill Areas Committee (HAC) from 2017-2020.http://www.easternmirrornagaland.com/tt- haokip-elected-as-new-chairman-of-the-hac/ He was the former Deputy Speaker of the 6th Manipur Legislative Assembly.He joined the Indian National Congress in June,2020. ==History== * Elected MLA from 57 Henglep(ST) A/C, 6th Manipur Legislative Assembly 1998, and Deputy Speaker Manipur Legislative Assembly. * Elected MLA from 57 Henglep(ST) A/C, 11th Manipur Legislative Assembly 2017. * Chairman, Hill Areas Committee (HAC) ==References== Category:Members of the Manipur Legislative Assembly Category:Manipur politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Manipur Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Manipur Category:People from Churachandpur district
title: T. Thangzalam Haokip
